description:
A component for rendering a `li` component with icons, avatars, and text.

Any remaing props will be passed to the inner `ListItem` component. This
will allow you to use custom components such as `react-router`'s `Link`
component.

primaryText.description: This should be the main text to display.

secondaryText.description:
An optional secondary text to display below the `primaryText`. This can
be an additional 1 or 2 lines. The text will automatically be ellipsed
if it spans more than one line. If the prop `threeLines` is set to true,
then the text will automatically be ellipsed if it spans more than two lines.

className.description:
The className to apply to the `.md-list-item` component which is the
entire container.

style.description: An optional style to apply to the `.md-list-item` component.

tileClassName.description: The className to apply to the `.md-list-tile` component.

tileStyle.description: An optional style to apply to the `.md-list-tile` component.

leftIcon.description: An optional icon to display to the left of the text.

leftAvatar.description: An optional avatar to display to the left of the text.

rightIcon.description: An optional icon to display to the left of the text.

rightAvatar.description: An optional avatar to display to the left of the text.

component.description:
The component to render the `.md-list-tile` as. This can be set
as an external component if you need additional functionality.

An example would be setting this to be `react-router`'s `Link` component
so that it redirects on click.

nestedItems.description:
An optional list of `ListItem`, `ListItemControl`, `Divider`, or `Subheader`
to use as a nested list.

initiallyOpen.description: Boolean if the nested list should initially be displayed.

isOpen.description:
Boolean if the nested list is currently open. This forces the component
to be a controlled component.

onExpanderClick.description: The optional function to call when the nested item expander button is clicked.

expandOnClick.description:
A boolean if the nested items should be toggled if the `ListItem` is clicked
instead of only the expander button.

expanderIconChildren.description: Any children required to render the expander icon.

expanderIconClassName.description: The icon className to use for the expander icon.

onClick.description: An optional function to call when the `ListItem` is clicked.

disabled.description: Boolean if the item is currently disabled.

threeLines.description:
Boolean if the `ListItem` should allow three lines of text including
the `primaryText`.
